term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - self inductance, L
term.title: self inductance

item.text: For a thin conducting loop, the magnetic flux through the loop, caused by an electric current in the loop, divided by that current.

term.citation: Citation: 'self inductance' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.S05583

term.disclaimer: The International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) is continuously reviewing and, where needed, updating terms in the Compendium of Chemical Terminology (the IUPAC Gold Book). Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
